mapper.insert: INSERT INTO goods_request (member_id, goods_request_name, goods_category_sub_code, goods_request_price, goods_request_amount, goods_request_image, goods_request_desc, goods_request_date, goods_request_approval )VALUES ( #{goodsSellerId}, #{goodsRequestName}, #{goodsCategorySubCode}, #{goodsRequestPrice}, #{goodsRequestAmount}, #{goodsRequestImage}, #{goodsRequestDesc}, CURDATE(), false );
